name: Runner Runner: A Space Journey
description:
This is a short demo I'm working on. It's a hack and slash, space adventure demo that promotes stylish combat and unique movement-based gameplay. Its still in very early devepment and will not be the final product.

There's a longer and more fleshed out demo linked in the game.
